name: Out of Graves
description:
Description

Being the gravekeeper of the Dead's Town graveyard isn't easy.Suffering of an epidemic disease that turns its citizens into zombies, people started to casually throw bodies in the graveyard.
And now it is running out of graves!

"Too many bodies, too many zombies, too few graves!"  
 - Dead's Town Gravekeeper

Commands

WASD- Movement
Space bar - Action (Hold it to grab bodies and bury them / Press and release for an attack)

Tools Used

Unity 2018.1
DOTween (http://dotween.demigiant.com)
Visual Studio Community 2017
Audacity
Photoshop CS6
Illustrator CS6
